tha-ap548:4.2: anantajinasaṁsari → anantajanasaṁsadi (bj); anantajanataṁ sudhī (sya1ed, sya2ed); anantajanataṁsarī (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap548:11.4: tayā santhuto → yo tava sāsane (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap548:12.1: homahaṁ vīra → tādisohaṁ mahāvīra (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
tha-ap548:21.2: nikkhamitvā agārato → nikkhanto pabbajitthaso (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap548:23.1: Isivhayaṁ gamitvāna → isivhayaṁ patanaṁ gantvā (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap548:27.2: maṁ mahāparisāya so → mamāha purisāsabho (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
